title: Defining Terms
text: The terms are the individual expressions that are added or subtracted that make up the whole expression
speech: The terms are the individual expressions that are added or subtracted that make up the whole expression
pacedSpeech: The terms are the individual expressions that are added or subtracted that make up the whole expression

title: Finding individual Terms
text: Therefore, find the individual pieces that are being added or subtracted.
speech: Therefore, find the individual pieces that are being added or subtracted.
pacedSpeech: Therefore, find the individual pieces that are being added or subtracted.
